21658004,s2,T6,T7,"The fission yeast Schizosaccharomyces pombe possesses a single essential Tm, ",Cdc8,", which can be acetylated on its N-terminal methionine residue to increase its affinity for ",actin, and enhance its ability to regulate myosin function.,Complex_formation

21658004,s4,T10,T11,"By correlating the stability of each protein, its propensity to form stable polymers, its ability to associate with ",actin," and to regulate myosin, we have shown that the stability of the N-terminal of the ",Cdc8, alpha-helix is crucial for Tm function.,Complex_formation

21658004,s5,T12,T22,In addition we have identified a novel ,Cdc8," mutant with increased N-terminal stability, dimers of which are capable of forming ",Tm, polymers significantly longer than the wild-type protein.,Not_a_complex
